import "../PanelPage.css"; import "./TicketPage.css"; import ticketsSvg from '../../../assets/panel-tickets.svg' import {useEffect, useState} from 'react'; import {useNavigate} from "react-router-dom"; import Button from "../../Button/Button"; import {beautifyMinutes} from "../../../utils/utils"; import LoadingAnimation from "../../LoadingAnimation/LoadingAnimation"; const Results = ({value})=>{ const [data, setData] = useState({}); const navigate = useNavigate(); const loadData = async () =>{ const response = await fetch(`http://localhost:3000/get-movies-by-date?date=${value}`) console.log(`http://localhost:3000/get-movies-by-date?date=${value}`) response.json() .then(res=>{ console.log("Response: ",res) setData(res) }) } const RedirectToBooking = (id) =>{ navigate(`/book/${id}&date=${value}`) } useEffect(()=>{ setData({}) loadData(); return ()=>{}; },[value]) // if(isDateInPast(value)) // return

} )} } else return
